id.description: The name of the top-level package

info.description: Previous version of artifacts way of naming some properties; deprecated in new artifacts.

summary.description: A shorter description of the artifact.

registries.description: A set of transitive artifact registries.

error.description: An error message to print if this entry is evaluated.

warning.description: A warning message to print if this entry is evaluated.

message.description: A message to print if this entry is evaluated.

requires.description: Artifacts that are required for this package to function.

acquisition-tags.description: A set of tags used to partially acquire a graph of artifacts. `vcpkg acquire-manifest --tags a,b` will acquire only those artifacts with a or b in this set.
